description.raw: This is a temporary fix for issue #69, adds contact sensors in the feet and some of the multisense model changes. I used an xmldiff tool to compare models/atlas/model.urdf with the output of `roscd atlas_utils; rosrun xacro xacro.py robots/atlas.model.xacro` and manually synchronized.
description.html: This is a temporary fix for issue #69, adds contact sensors in the feet and some of the multisense model changes. I used an xmldiff tool to compare models/atlas/model.urdf with the output of roscd atlas_utils; rosrun xacro xacro.py robots/atlas.model.xacro and manually synchronized.
